import sys

t = int(input())
while t:
    n, c = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(" ")]
    N = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(" ")]
    total = 0
    for x in N:
        total = total + x
    if total <= c:
        print('Yes')
    else:
        print('No')
    t -= 1
